original_text: Satan will then go and deceive people in nations everywhere in the world. He will make them believe him. Those nations are God's enemies, Gog and Magog. Satan will bring them together to fight a war against God's people. Satan's army has many people, as much as the sand on the shore of the sea.
korean_text: 나와서 땅의 사방 백성 곧 곡과 마곡을 미혹하고 모아 싸움을 붙이리니 그 수가 바다의 모래 같으리라

sentences.original_text: and deceive people in nations everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 나라의 사람들을 속일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will make them believe him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 자신을 믿게 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to fight a war against God's people
as much as the sand on the shore of the sea
